title: FluidsReport
description: Used to capture an analysis of the drilling mud.

id.description: Previously called ResourceID or SRN which identifies this OSDU resource object without version.
id.title: Entity ID

kind.description: The schema identification for the OSDU resource object following the pattern {Namespace}:{Source}:{Type}:{VersionMajor}.{VersionMinor}.{VersionPatch}. The versioning scheme follows the semantic versioning, https://semver.org/.
kind.title: Entity Kind

version.description: The version number of this OSDU resource; set by the framework.
version.title: Version Number

acl.description: The access control tags associated with this entity.
acl.title: Access Control List

legal.description: The entity's legal tags and compliance status. The actual contents associated with the legal tags is managed by the Compliance Service.
legal.title: Legal Tags

tags.title: Tag Dictionary
tags.description: A generic dictionary of string keys mapping to string value. Only strings are permitted as keys and values.

createTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which initial version of this OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
createTime.title: Resource Object Creation DateTime

createUser.title: Resource Object Creation User Reference
createUser.description: The user reference, which created the first version of this resource object. Set by the System.

modifyTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which this version of the OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
modifyTime.title: Resource Object Version Creation DateTime

modifyUser.title: Resource Object Version Creation User Reference
modifyUser.description: The user reference, which created this version of this resource object. Set by the System.

ancestry.description: The links to data, which constitute the inputs, from which this record instance is derived.
ancestry.title: Ancestry

meta.description: The Frame of Reference meta data section linking the named properties to self-contained definitions.
meta.title: Frame of Reference Meta Data

StartDateTime.title: Report Date Time
StartDateTime.description: Start DateTime of the reporting period

EndDateTime.title: Report Date Time
EndDateTime.description: End DateTime of the reporting period

Fluid.title: Fluid
Fluid.description: The drilling fluids that are represented on this report

items.title: Fluid
items.description: Information regarding an individual fluid that is part of the Drilling Report.

Type.title: Type
Type.description: Description for the type of fluid.

BrandName.title: Brand Name
BrandName.description: The name of the fluid as given by the supplier

SampleDateTime.title: Date Time
SampleDateTime.description: The time when fluid readings were recorded.

MeasuredDepth.title: Measured Depth
MeasuredDepth.description: The measured depth where the fluid readings were recorded.

TVD.title: TVD
TVD.description: The true vertical depth where the fluid readings were recorded.

EquivalentCirculatingDensity.title: Equivalent Circulating Density
EquivalentCirculatingDensity.description: Equivalent circulating density where fluid reading was recorded or calculated/simulated

EquivalentStaticDensity.title: Equivalent Static Density
EquivalentStaticDensity.description: Equivalent static density where fluid reading was recorded or calculated/simulated

KickToleranceVolume.title: Kick Tolerance Volume
KickToleranceVolume.description: Assumed kick volume for calculation of kick tolerance based on the kick intensity where the fluid reading was recorded.

KickToleranceIntensity.title: Kick Tolerance Intensity
KickToleranceIntensity.description: Assumed kick density for calculation of kick tolerance where the fluid reading was recorded.

TemperatureFlowLine.title: Temperature Flow Line
TemperatureFlowLine.description: Flow line temperature measurement where the fluid reading was recorded.

MudClass.title: Mud Class
MudClass.description: The class of the drilling fluid.

Density.title: Density
Density.description: Fluid density. This excludes the cuttings.

YieldPoint.title: Yield Point
YieldPoint.description: Yield point (Bingham and Herschel Bulkley models).

LowShearYieldPoint.title: Low Shear Yield Point
LowShearYieldPoint.description: Shearing capacity of mud at low velocity

FilterCakeLtlp.title: Filter Cake Ltlp
FilterCakeLtlp.description: Filter cake thickness at low (normal) temperature and pressure.

FiltrateLtlp.title: Filtrate Ltlp
FiltrateLtlp.description: API water loss (low temperature and pressure mud filtrate measurement) (volume per 30 min).

FiltrateHthp.title: Filtrate Hthp
FiltrateHthp.description: High temperature high pressure (HTHP) filtrate (volume per 30 min).

FilterCakeHthp.title: Filter Cake Hthp
FilterCakeHthp.description: High temperature high pressure (HTHP) filter cake thickness.

SolidsLowGravCorrected.title: Solids Low Grav Corrected
SolidsLowGravCorrected.description: Solids low gravity content corrected for chloride content

SolidsHiGravCorrected.title: Solids Hi Grav Corrected
SolidsHiGravCorrected.description: Solids high gravity content corrected for chloride content

Mbt.title: Mbt
Mbt.description:
Cation exchange capacity (CEC) of the mud sample as measured by methylene blue titration (MBT).

NOTE: This is temporarily set to be a GenericMeasure with no unit validation, pending addition of CEC units to the Energistics UoM spec.

AlkalinityP1.title: Alkalinity P1
AlkalinityP1.description:
Mud alkalinity P1 from alternate alkalinity method (volume in ml of 0.02N acid 
to reach the phenolphthalein endpoint).

AlkalinityP2.title: Alkalinity P2
AlkalinityP2.description: Mud alkalinity P2 from alternate alkalinity method (volume in ml of 0.02N acid to titrate, the reagent mixture to the phenolphthalein endpoint).

BrineDensity.title: Brine Density
BrineDensity.description: Density of water phase of NAF.

ElectStab.title: Elect Stab
ElectStab.description: Measurement of the emulsion stability and oil-wetting capability in oil-based muds.

CompanyID.title: Company
CompanyID.description: Reference to the Company performing the analysis

MudEngineer.title: Mud Engineer
MudEngineer.description: The name of the Mud Engineer

Polymer.title: Polymer
Polymer.description: Polymers present in the mud system.

PolymerType.title: Polymer Type
PolymerType.description: Type of polymers present in the mud system.

SolCorPc.title: Sol Cor Pc
SolCorPc.description: Solids corrected for chloride content percent.

AverageCuttingSize.title: Average Cutting Size
AverageCuttingSize.description: Average size of the drill cuttings.

Turbidity.title: Turbidity
Turbidity.description: Turbidity units to measure the cloudiness or haziness of a fluid.

WaterPhaseSalinity.title: Water Phase Salinity
WaterPhaseSalinity.description: A factor showing the activity level of salt in oil-based mud.

WholeMudCalcium.title: Whole Mud Calcium
WholeMudCalcium.description: Calcium content in the whole mud sample, including oil and water phases.

WholeMudChloride.title: Whole Mud Chloride
WholeMudChloride.description: Chloride content in the whole mud sample, including oil and water phases.

Rheometer.title: Rheometer
Rheometer.description: Details of the Rheometer tests performed on the fluid sample

TemperatureRheometer.title: Temperature Rheometer
TemperatureRheometer.description: The temperature at which the rheometer values were measured

PressureRheometer.title: Pressure Rheometer
PressureRheometer.description: The pressure at which the rheometer values were measured

RheometerViscosities.title: Rheometer Viscosities
RheometerViscosities.description: The viscosities recorder during the Rheometer test

Speed.title: Speed
Speed.description: Rotational speed of the rheometer, typically in RPM.

Viscosity.title: Viscosity
Viscosity.description: The raw reading from a rheometer. This could be, but is not necessarily, a viscosity.

WellboreID.title: Wellbore ID
WellboreID.description: Reference to the wellbore that is the subject of this fluids report
